name: Ellin
desc: A young lady who dreams of joining the Knights of Favonius. She can often be found honing her sword techniques behind the Knights of Favonius Headquarters.

voice.title: Jean's sword skills...
voice.desc: Hah... Jean's sword fighting is so much better than this!

voice.title: Gale Blade!
voice.desc: Gale Blade! ...Oh, it seems I can't do it.

value.name: Ellin
value.desc:
"Knightly Dream" Ellin

"I've got to hone my spirit and strength both if my sword arm is to be as steady as Master Jean's!"

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
How are you supposed to get rid of those pesky hilichurls firing arrows from their vantage points?
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: Your Support Zone starts with 1 "Ellin" card.</color>
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: Ellin can decrease the Elemental Dice Cost of Skills when the same ones are used consecutively. Use her ability well!</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
The girl who often practices her swordsmanship is setting up the table. Although it is slightly messy, it is more than enough for an Adventure Challenge.
